# inkType

**Instance Property**

The tool type that determines the shape of the rendered content.

## Declaration

```swift
var inkType: PKInkingTool.InkType { get set }
```

## Getting the tool type

- **PKInkingTool.InkType**: The type that defines the shape of stroked lines.
